mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post( post_no, subject, e_mail, msg, tb_flag ) VALUES ( post_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{member.e_mail}, #{msg}, #{tb_flag} )
INSERT INTO media_tag( post_no, tag_name, img, video ) VALUES( post_seq.CURRVAL, #{tag_name}, #{img}, #{video} )
mapper.select: SELECT post_no, subject, e_mail, post_date, like_count, hate_count FROM post ORDER BY post_no DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT post_no, subject, e_mail, post_date, like_count, hate_count, tb_flag FROM post WHERE tb_flag = 'b' ORDER BY post_no DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN startRow( #{currentPage}, #{cntPerPage} ) AND endRow( #{currentPage}, #{cntPerPage} )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE tb_flag = 'b'
SELECT post_no, subject, like_count, hate_count,e_mail, post_date FROM post WHERE subject LIKE #{value} AND AND tb_flag = 'b' ORDER BY post_no DESC
SELECT post_no, subject, e_mail, post_date, like_count, hate_count FROM post WHERE e_mail = #{value} AND tb_flag = 'b' ORDER BY post_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(post_no, reply_no, reply_email, msg, reply_date, like_count, img) VALUES(#{post_no}, reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reply_email}, #{msg}, SYSDATE, #{like_count}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_no, msg, like_count, reply_email, reply_date, post_no FROM reply WHERE post_no = #{post_no} ORDER BY reply_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report(report_no, post_no, reply_no, reporter_email, reported_email, report_kind, report_date) VALUES(report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{post_no}, #{reply_no}, #{reporter_email}, #{reported_email}, #{report_kind}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO blacklist(blacklist_no, e_mail, bl_date, bl_release) VALUES(blacklist_seq.NEXTVAL, #{e_mail}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + 30 )
